product_info.description:
--- Page 1 ---
PRODUCT SPEC SHEET
ZE511/ZE521 RFID PRINT ENGINES
ZE511/ZE521 RFID Print Engines
Mission critical doesn’t compromise – neither do Zebra print engines
Your lines and equipment must stand up to the 24/7/365 test, but you need more than just durable performance. Keep your
operations moving forward with Zebra’s rugged ZE511 and ZE521 RFID print engines, intelligently engineered to make your work
easier – today and tomorrow. These purpose-built essential workers deliver it all: RFID encoding for advanced tracking, fast print
speeds and all-metal construction for demanding operation, innovative features and forward capabilities for years of use, along with
onboard analytics and expedited maintenance elements to maximize uptime. And, they feature Zebra’s exclusive, industry-leading
Print DNA™ software suite that makes them easy to setup, manage, maintain and secure – onsite or remotely. So, go ahead. Push
the limits. A Zebra print engine won’t let you down.
Zebra RFID: More Transformation, No
Complication
Print and Encode With Ease
Featuring Zebra’s own RE40 module, you can easily print and
encode 4-inch RFID labels with the ZE511 and 6-inch RFID
labels with the ZE521 for deeper visibility and insights in an
ever-competitive business environment. Access the intuitive
RFID wizards via the screen to get started.
Do RFID Your Way, Automatically
Incorporating Zebra’s exclusive adaptive encoding technology
with new algorithms, it eliminates complex and complicated
placement guidelines so you can accurately encode smaller
Innovation has Arrived
labels spaced closely together. Enjoy greater media flexibility
and design labels for your application without limitation.
Extending the ZE500 Series Legacy Automatically calibrate RFID in minutes and adopt new inlays
Advancing the proven ZE500 Series, ZE511R and ZE521R print without pretesting. Simply calibrate and use them.
engines build on this durable, reliable legacy with innovative
RFID technology, faster print speeds, performance-enhancing Engineered to Endure
capabilities and evolving intelligence that make them stand
apart. Added features such as the 4.3-inch, full-color LCD
Encased Design Withstands Harsh Environments
touch screen make operation easier. See printer status at a
glance, make expedited settings changes and access support. The ZE511 and ZE521 RFID deliver rugged durability to push
the limits. Engineered without the need for cooling fans, their
external cabinets are designed to resist debris and water
ingress making them ideal in dusty environments or where
water may be splashed.
Push the limits. Non-stop RFID printing/encoding for your mission-critical operations.
For more information, please visit www.zebra.com/ze511-ze521-rfid
--- Page 2 ---
Proven to Perform Remove the hassle with the ZE511 and ZE521, engineered to
handle tomorrow’s technology. With the revolutionary Print
DNA software suite, they have the innovative edge to grow
Outstanding Print Speeds and Quality
with your business.
Keep your lines moving quickly with best-in-class print speeds,
up to 18 inches per second. For 203 dpi use cases printing
Don’t Compromise – Drive Performance
faster than 14 ips, select the optional high-speed printhead¹.
For premium print resolution, choose the 600 dpi option¹. with the Most Innovative Software Suite
Simple to Maintain and Service Simple to Deploy, Use, Manage and Secure
Now including Zebra’s innovative Print DNA software suite,
Predict Maintenance Needs to Minimize Downtime powered by our Link-OS operating system, the ZE511 and
Use onboard analytics to predict and schedule maintenance to ZE521 are incredibly easy to integrate, use, manage and
prevent unexpected downtime. Troubleshoot remotely and secure. Deploy them anywhere with setup tools, wizards and
swap out the extended-life modular drive quickly and easily via emulation capabilities. The large color touch screen and
only three screws for offline servicing to keep workflows intuitive user interface make setup and operation easy with
moving. minimal training. See status at a glance from any angle via the
screen that can be rotated and remotely located, up to two
New Printhead Design Expedites Replacement meters, for convenient accessibility.
The ZE511 and ZE521 have an improved socketed printhead
Make Setup Efficient
design that eliminates tools with the quick-release tab. Easily
remove all three platen, pinch and peel rollers in minutes from Provision printers quickly and easily by mirroring using a USB
the front of the print engine without the need to remove the flash drive including firmware, embedded files and settings.
unit from the print-and-apply system. Or, configure using a mobile device and Zebra’s Printer Setup
Utilities.
Interior Space and Frustration-Free Details
Connect Your Way With Comprehensive Communication
Captured fasteners eliminate lost hardware. Quickly access
internal components via a hinged cage system that swings Add your ZE511 or ZE521 to your existing wired and wireless
open wide for fast, simple maintenance, newly designed with networks or connect them directly to any PC. Every ZE511 and
even more interior workspace. ZE521 comes with USB, Serial, Ethernet, a dual USB Host port
and Bluetooth™ 4.1. Add an optional Parallel, 802.11 a/c
Explore Managed Print Services (MPS) With Assurance wireless or Ethernet card to the open internal communication
slot. And, with the included Print Touch tag (NFC), you can
Looking to gain control and visibility of your print engines with
simply tap a compatible mobile device on the ZE511 or ZE521
MPS? Zebra’s thermal printers with Print DNA, including the
to pair and print.
ZE511 and ZE521, make it easy. They’re engineered for
durability, and they offer innovative remote management,
Update, Troubleshoot and Monitor–All From a Single
analytics and security capabilities that make them the obvious
Location
choice for MPS. With the Print DNA software toolset, your
Zebra MPS provider can remotely manage and optimize your With Zebra’s Printer Profile Manager Enterprise, part of Print
printers, track and automate supplies replenishment and DNA, you have the ability to easily manage, secure and
ensure security. This leaves you free to lower your operating troubleshoot your networked print engines from any location.
costs and minimize your IT workload. An intuitive browser-based interface lets you see status at a
glance, quickly triage issues to minimize downtime and
Put it to Work for Years perform updates and maintenance.
Unparalleled, Peace-of-Mind Printer Security
Forward Focused to Match Your Evolving Business Needs
Security risks are real and costly. Endpoints are becoming
Printers should add to your operations, not create obstacles.
popular targets – including networked thermal printers and
print engines. Shield yourself from cyberattacks with Zebra’s
PrintSecure, part of Print DNA. Use it to easily configure your
printers via secure connections, identify vulnerabilities, block
unauthorized access and detect events before they happen.
--- Page 3 ---

Applications

complete traceability Barcode Symbologies

RFID printers

serialization (MCS)
subsets A/B/C and UCC Case Codes, ISBT-128, UPC-A, UPC-E,

Standard Features 2D Barcodes: Codablock, PDF417, Code 49, DataMatrix,
MaxiCode, QR Code, TLC 39, MicroPDF, RSS-14 (and composite),
Aztec
• Print Methods: Thermal transfer and direct thermal printing
• Orientation: right-hand or left-hand
• 4.3 in. color touch screen with intuitive menu for quick
operation and settings Fonts and Graphics
• Industrial all-metal construction
• Communications: USB 2.0, RS-232 Serial, 10/100 Ethernet,
Zebra Global printing solution including Unicode™
Bluetooth 4.1, Dual USB Host, Applicator Interface

• Quick release, thin film printhead with E3 Element Energy
times, height- and width-independent

expandable dot-by-dot, height- and width-independent

IBM™ Code Page 850 International Characters

www.zebra.com/zebradesigner

logos
